snippet.title: Sonic Heroes but it's my own Sonic fan game
snippet.description:
I have updated Sonic and The Hedgehogs.

The latest version can be found on this link:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1BhPI_Hx2NK3UMVQyTIpjLrPA1IhNGlWI

The latest update includes the following:

FIXES
- SA1 Level now has Music.
- The camera will no longer offset itself when Dynamic Camera is not enabled.
- Sonic can now only throw rings when there are valid targets nearby.
- Objective UI for the Tutorial Level now properly displays Objectives when the level is initially loaded.
- Sonic will no longer collect the same ring multiple times

NEW
- Sonic Heroes Level has been added
- Options Menu has been added to the Startup Logo Screen
- Option to Render Portal View has been added (recommend leaving disabled to maintain performance)
- Tutorial Level now has a Terrarium, some updated materials, and more Badniks
- Destroying Badniks now makes them explode spectacularly with Debris while also releasing a small animal
- Sonic now ragdolls when he is defeated

#sonic #sonicthehedgehog  #sonicfangame #unity #unity3d #fangame
